paragraphs: You breathe deep, center yourself, and step.

The darkness resists—a pressure against your skin, a voice whispering TURN BACK—and you feel the fear catch in your throat like a hook. But you do not stop. You carry the fear with you, and the darkness yields.
The amber light flares bright as day, then fades to gentle gold. You stand in the center of a stage impossibly vast, its edges lost to shadow. Above, an audience of empty seats waits.
You have crossed. The Understage acknowledges you.
A voice speaks from everywhere at once: "WELCOME, PROMPTER. YOUR STORY BEGINS NOW."
Through courage, you have crossed the threshold. The Preservationists note your strength.
Thank you for experiencing The Understage vertical slice.

ending.title: The Courageous Crossing
ending.description: Your courage carried you across the threshold. The Understage opens before you.
